name: Lagenda
tag_list: apps, iphone, android, ipad, sorties, agenda, loisirs, culture, spectacle, content, cityguide, event, b2b2c, webservice, lagenda, white-label, edition, paris, tourism, leisure, entertainment, publishing
overview:
Plurimedia Guides and Events Promotion, B2BC offers.

5 Great Reasons to publish our interactive content on your site using our e-services in order to:

-> Refine your homepage with your content automatically updated by our XML API webservices, -> Organize domains using keywords specific to your field : culture, tourism, music, art, entertainement -> Offer context and target your offers for increased registrations and sales, in 8 languages 800 destinations -> Qualify your user databases by tracking habits and preferences -> Personalize and revitalize your pages and e-mails

Specialties: Lagenda is specialized in communication and promotion of cultural events and leisure activities throughout 30 countries. We list, describe, select and distribute all events to leaders in Internet tourism and media. We are the mediator between organisers on one end, and Web leaders (media, tourism and transportation operators, brands, e-commerce players) on the other. The strength of our services lies its network guaranteeing access to information.
